intro: Bersama oligoneura, commonly known as the narrow-leafed sedge, is a perennial herbaceous plant belonging to the Cyperaceae family. It is characterized by its grass-like appearance, with narrow, linear leaves and small, clustered flowers. The plant typically grows in wet or marshy environments, thriving in humid and temperate climates. Its rhizomatous growth habit allows it to spread and form dense vegetation in suitable habitats. Bersama oligoneura plays a role in stabilizing soil and providing habitat for various microorganisms and invertebrates.
